alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:30PM MST until January 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches each day (rest of afternoon into early evening and Friday) for a total of 4 to 16 inches (local higher amounts possible). Winds gusting around 30 to 35 mph with localized gusts around 40 mph, especially for the Central mountains. * WHERE...Island Park, Driggs, Tetonia, Ashton and Kilgore. Highest amounts against the Wyoming line, particularly the mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Friday. Current wave of moisture will continue until early evening. There will be a pause and the next wave of moistures starts by mid Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. Expect blowing and drifting of snow. Overnight expect wet roads to freeze, especially above 5500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin
